channel.title: I need help putting my server online
channel.description: ok so about a week ago i finished making my amazing server called Extrocity-Pk 317. i got a no-ip and ran my server on the ip of 50.129.162.37. in my client and server folders i changed all the required ip's to 50.129.162.37 and my server was up and running fine. i even had about 5 players online at one time. then one day i restarted my computer and when it came on i turned on the server, turned on no-ip, and ran my client, but it kept saying error connecting to server. i don't understand why it would just stop working because i reset my computer. i am using a wireless connection on netgear but i dont think it matters that it's a wireless because my server worked fine a week ago. i have tried so much but i just don't understand it. Can someone please tell me what to do! i am very frustrated. also, if anyone here has a very good server source and client they would like to give me.. then that would be cool. I coded my server for 3 weeks and idk maybe i messed it up somehow..

item.title: I need help putting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Fluffys Fluffys
item.description:
@Fluffys wrote:

i have posted this same thing on liike 10 different sites and i was about to give up but you got it to work now all i need to do is figure out how to make a .jar file for a webclient do you know how?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help putting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Fluffys:

OMG i love you so much. it worked. this has troubled me for a whole week. i love you!!! is their a way to rep? or tell an admin you helped? because you are a huge help and i really appreciate it )))))))

haha Naw, my rep is as high as it can go. I’m glad i helped though.

item.title: I need help putting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Fluffys:

how do i fix (dynamic ip) i dont want it to change a bunch and thanks for the help

Just use no-ip in place of your real IP

If someone was to decompile your client, then would have your real IP which could be bad.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help putting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

DON’T USE CAPS, IT SOUNDS LIKE YOUR YELLING.
And you might have a dynamic IP (it changes)

Also, you don’t need your IP AND No-IP. Just use No-IP.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help putting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Fluffys Fluffys
item.description:
@Fluffys wrote:

ok so about a week ago i finished making my amazing server called Extrocity-Pk 317. i got a no-ip and ran my server on the ip of 50.129.162.37. in my client and server folders i changed all the required ip’s to 50.129.162.37 and my server was up and running fine. i even had about 5 players online at one time. then one day i restarted my computer and when it came on i turned on the server, turned on no-ip, and ran my client, but it kept saying error connecting to server. i don’t understand why it would just stop working because i reset my computer. i am using a wireless connection on netgear but i dont think it matters that it’s a wireless because my server worked fine a week ago. i have tried so much but i just don’t understand it. Can someone please tell me what to do! i am very frustrated. also, if anyone here has a very good server source and client they would like to give me… then that would be cool. I coded my server for 3 weeks and idk maybe i messed it up somehow…
